name: Dexterity
headline: Turn your browser into an AI interface that works alongside you.
description: The productivity tool built for co-working with AI, right on top of your browser. Dex intelligently interacts across web apps using simple voice and text to 10x your workflows.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:productivity; industry:consumer-products; industry:automation; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Kevin Gu, Founder
founders.description: Kevin is the co-founder & CTO of Dexterity. At Harvard, he studied math in undergrad and statistics for his concurrent master’s. He has worked as a quantitative/ML researcher at Jump Trading, IBM Research, and QuantCo, as well as an engineer at Meta.

founders.name: Regina Lin, Founder
founders.description: Regina is the co-Founder & CEO of Dexterity. She studied Mathematics with a concurrent master's in Computational Science at Harvard (on leave). She previously co-founded Contour AI, a devOps tool for LLM evaluation, and helped build the first MVP of Bazar, a GC-backed ecommerce marketplace with 40K+ customers. She previously held various investment analysis roles across public & private financial markets, and founded a nonprofit in Dallas with 300+ volunteers.

Backed by 
10x Your Workflow
Right In The Browser
Turn your digital workspace into an AI interface that works alongside you. Smart, fast, and fluid. 
## Trusted by forward-thinking professionals at leading teams.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/EZC42uklqSP6vQeWqQCECznaFk.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/a2KDnBg2PexY42BL8jReM4tGM.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mj3runVOL1BvHIAA7mbWaDEWAQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DMLKVfT68AdnaqM2ppIblLMHc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ymGw2J1BQpMEvJnyKsFlgomZs34.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xw4d1iZ4I3gZLHTmQj9pyzCop3U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NDCYybf0bPRHCyxYCAuejbC9WEA.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/OXEmuIW3W7b5jCqJwgeTEuatGs.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/75emCW6nnZkVcWCPMt3QIwImW4.jpg)
Imagine a web interface
 _built around you._
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/75emCW6nnZkVcWCPMt3QIwImW4.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xyZW5h7KS7zor4o4rTwe6tqmMck.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yhv4N2WAxaesCWn8c1JC1cZNuTM.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JiFzUuVftwlaHi02sMPrcXvY5f8.png)
Navigate With Natural Language
Get Anywhere Instantly
Move through the web at the speed of thought. Dex anticipates your next move, delivering the right context exactly where you need it. 
Just type or speak to get there instantly—no complex menus or remembering shortcuts.
Accelerate Multi-Step Workflows
Cross Tab Automation
No more searching, clicking, and context switching. Dex sends content across tabs and creates automations between apps tailored to your workflow. 
From outreach to data entry, get things done without ever leaving the tab.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JJEW58k493LB4liEe1OhbZpt1xA.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KlUUspvCrzmn9hGx5lobvohZQ3w.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xyZW5h7KS7zor4o4rTwe6tqmMck.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LQ6zPxcEgQSqS8n904kWD01HQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HLozwz2gALmg83OKsrwOi1YE5Yw.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ch4bH2G1jNf99eI83f20QnCT8CY.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zfgvSwa3H2UiQf5POhCpaUQRLWA.png)
Adaptive UI Intelligence
Talk To Your Browser
Dex reshapes web pages as you speak—filtering results, adjusting settings, and updating layouts in real time. 
Whether browsing products, filling out forms, or refining searches, Dex instantly updates the interface to surface what you need.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Z6n6kxWwJm6gvlajuZsPo5UXd4Q.jpg)
A new paradigm
 _for digital interaction._
Dex responds dynamically to user intent, enhancing interfaces and suggesting actions that are personalized to your style.
[Download Now](https://getdexterity.com/<./>)
Stay in the loop.
Join the community and learn how other power users get the most out of Dex.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NGbNihO6VoM7x5rvYGyyyykBxoI.png)
Discord
Get the inside track on new features and learn how other people use Dex. 
[Join](https://getdexterity.com/<https:/discord.gg/a8Vbykus>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/I3L1nsh6cZdB0eWU5H4CA0WWXP4.webp)
X / Twitter
Keep up to date with the latest releases, features and improvements
[Follow](https://getdexterity.com/<https:/x.com/dexterity_ai>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HLozwz2gALmg83OKsrwOi1YE5Yw.jpg)
AI That Goes Deep
We're starting with deeply integrated knowledge graphs to master high-impact tools.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Z6n6kxWwJm6gvlajuZsPo5UXd4Q.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vrZqc49PMV7QFOssHIz8EWYRw.png)
GitHub
Navigate and manage issues, PRs, and repos within Dex—or use AI to take multi-step actions directly on GitHub's site.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zxLNAxDNA2tBY97twhwHJgbp4.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kAklYv6AyH1Fdc0r1qmBqalnbKQ.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/d22qwfeoSXCt5PLyqw92HtaBgw.webp)
Google Suite
Search emails, schedule meetings, retrieve documents, and send information to Drive—all without leaving your workflow.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KKFMiVscodp8DwP2kmoa4P0lM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/C7i1gQnPgOGA3kWKBwLxN4iTiy8.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eIDifEepcllMTSnFfdMm68QyzI.png)
Notion
Seamlessly sync context into Notion—capture notes, automate data entry, and keep everything organized effortlessly.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/iHLnjVK1dpQaXh3zKcMOZ03Yc7c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/91pyYtTgviGvmxsBPMFS2DwBUtY.png)
Experience effortless productivity.

Navigate With Natural Language
Get Anywhere Instantly
Move through the web at the speed of thought. Dex anticipates your next move, delivering the right context exactly where you need it. 
Just type or speak to get there instantly—no complex menus or remembering shortcuts.
Accelerate Multi-Step Workflows
Cross Tab Automation
No more searching, clicking, and context switching. Dex sends content across tabs and creates automations between apps tailored to your workflow. 
From outreach to data entry, get things done without ever leaving the tab.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JJEW58k493LB4liEe1OhbZpt1xA.jpg)

Adaptive UI Intelligence
Talk To Your Browser
Dex reshapes web pages as you speak—filtering results, adjusting settings, and updating layouts in real time. 
Whether browsing products, filling out forms, or refining searches, Dex instantly updates the interface to surface what you need.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Z6n6kxWwJm6gvlajuZsPo5UXd4Q.jpg)

 _for digital interaction._
Dex responds dynamically to user intent, enhancing interfaces and suggesting actions that are personalized to your style.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Dexterity**

Founded in 2025 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W25, Dexterity is a startup based in San Francisco that aims to revolutionize productivity by turning your web browser into an AI-enhanced workspace. With a keen focus on improving workflows, Dexterity supports users in navigating and automating tasks directly within their browsers through a combination of voice and text commands.

**Mission**: "Turn your browser into an AI interface that works alongside you."

### What Dexterity Does

At its core, Dexterity is designed to help you **10x your workflows**. By using a smart assistant named Dex, the platform intelligently interacts with various web applications, eliminating the need for constant context-switching typically associated with multitasking. This streamlined approach allows users to focus on what truly matters, delivering a robust productivity boost.

- **Natural Language Navigation**: Get from point A to B instantly by simply speaking or typing. Dex anticipates your needs and presents the necessary context, removing layers of complexity that usually bog down online work.
  
- **Cross-Tab Automations**: Forget tedious searching and clicking. Dex helps you automate interactions across different tabs, making everything from data entry to project management effortless.

- **Adaptive UI Intelligence**: As you interact with web pages, Dex dynamically reshapes them to filter results and update layouts in real-time, tailoring your digital experience precisely to your needs.

### The Team

Currently, Dexterity is a nimble team of two, spearheaded by skilled founders who are driven to redefine how we engage with our digital spaces. The company is also backed by notable investor Michael Seibel as their Group Partner.

### Vision and Categories

Dexterity is categorically placed in the realms of **generative AI, productivity, consumer products, automation, and AI assistance**. It's all about making technology less obtrusive and more conversational.

### Community Engagement

Dexterity also emphasizes community involvement—users are encouraged to join platforms like Discord and Twitter to share insights and get the latest updates. The approach reflects a broader vision of collaboration and user empowerment.

### For More Information

If you're curious about integrating AI into your everyday digital workflow, check out their [website](https://getdexterity.com/) for downloads and community engagement.

In summary, Dexterity isn't just another productivity tool—it's a fresh paradigm for how we can harness AI directly in the browser, allowing professionals to navigate their work with unprecedented ease. Whether you're a solo entrepreneur or part of a large team, the opportunity to supercharge your workflow is right at your fingertips.
